RM Williams

RMW is an established footwear brand in Australia. They had a new set of brand guidelines and needed help translating those into a set of premium designs. Working remotely with them in Australia an on-brand set of designs were seamlessly integrated with their upcoming platform update.

Product Detail Page

Product Imagery

At wider breakpoints the extra space is used to show multiple high quality images

Width Size Guide

A Size Guide popup is easily accessible to help inform users on this relatively complex / unheard of selection.

Size Selector

RMW sells shoes using 4 different standards. This tabbed dropdown approach addresses this added complexity by neatly organising sizes.
